about_the_game: Dive into the heart of the universe of "Welcome to Rebirth Academy!" with this original soundtrack. Composed to accompany every key moment of the game, this soundtrack offers you enchanting and epic melodies. From dramatic tension to moments of romance, each track captures the essence of this immersive adventure. Relive the key moments of the game and let yourself be carried away by compositions that enrich every aspect of your "Rebirth Academy" experience. Perfect for fans of the game and lovers of Japanese-style music.
